abstract: When I click on an e-mail address on a Web page, my Mac automatically opens up a new message in Eudora to reply. Is there any way I can get it to open up a new message in Gmail?
snippet: When I click on an e-mail address on a Web page, my Mac automatically opens up a new message in Eudora to reply. Is there any way I can get it to open up a new message in Gmail?
lead_paragraph: If you have any museum visits planned for summer vacation, a quick visit to the institution’s Web site before you go can land you free MP3 audio tours or podcasts on the exhibits you plan to see. For example, the National Gallery of Art in Washington has audio and video podcasts (www.nga.gov/podcasts/index.shtm). Sir John Soane’s Museum in London has a full audio tour (introduced by the actor Stephen Fry) of the collection, available at www.soane.org/audio.html. Apple has audio tours from several museums posted at www.apple.com/ipod/ipodtours.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: An Audio Tour for Your Visit to the Museum
